The stakeholder priorities section allows you to [**spatially compare the areas that each type of organization prioritizes based on the resources they value the most**]{.underline}. This map compares the output maps from the natural resources section based on the Analytic Hierarchy Process results per organization type. [**It uses a diverging color scale to show the differences in area prioritization between the two groups**]{.underline}.

Follow this tour to learn how to use it and interpret the results.
